Name: retinal vasculitis
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by inflammation of the vascular branches of the retinal artery and has_symptom painless decrease of visual acuity

Name: Behcet's disease
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by an autoimmune mediated inflammation of the blood vessels throughout the body leading to ulcerations on the mouth and sometimes the genitals

Name: granulomatous angiitis
Definition: A cardiovascular organ benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in endothelial cells that line blood vessels and is characterised by increased number of normal or abnormal vessels filled with blood.

Name: Churg-Strauss syndrome
Definition: A vasculitits that is systemic vasculitis realized as blood vessel inflammation and has_symptom asthma along with hay fever

Name: Shwartzman phenomenon
Definition: An allergic contact dermatitis that has_allergic_trigger members of the toxicodendron family

Name: central nervous system vasculitis
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by inflammation of blood vessel walls in the brain or spine.

Name: obsolete non-resectable cholangiocellular carcinoma
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by inflammation of blood vessel walls in the brain or spine.

Name: polyarteritis nodosa
Definition: A vasculitis that is characterized by necrotizing inflammation of medium or small arteries.
